column4: joel: mplayer has the same issue... it takes a picture immediatly, so the person Im taking a pic of is probably 1/2 out of frame, is there a way to get it to wait till the person is in frame?
Come on people, its such a simple thing, a command that will take a picture of something, not just take a picture... there has to be something???
it takes 2 seconds to capture or what?
